Commentary.ab: Y3.15b vaŋᵛhībiiō] Redard; Geldner vaŋuhibiiō, Kellens vaŋᵛhibiiō.

Parallels.ab: vīspanąmca apąm mazdaδātanąm vīspanąmca uruuaranąm mazdaδātanąm ~ Y8.4 yā̊ apasca uruuarā̊; ~ Y8.8, Y11.4, Y52.6, Y60.10, Y68.18, Y71.29 vasō. āpō. vasō. uruuarā̊.; ~ Y9.4 āpa uruuaire; ~ Y12.12 yā varanā āpō yā varanā uruuarā̊ ; Y16.9 ~ yazamaide vīspā̊ āpō yazamaide vīspā uruuarā̊; Y18.2, Y51.8, Y65.15 ~ dāidī mōi yə̄ gąm tašō apascā uruuarā̊sca; ~ Y37.1 dāt̰ apascā dāt̰ uruuarā̊sca vaŋᵛhīš; ~ Y44.4 kə̄ apō uruuarā̊scā; ~ VrS65.78, VrS65.80 auui apąmca vaŋᵛhinąm uruuuarnąmca; ~ VrS65.78, VrS65.80 yā̊ vaŋᵛhīš yā̊ āpō yā̊sca uruuarā̊.
